Here's a fun #rstats design pattern I've become more and more fond of: use magrittr's %T>% tee operator to keep returning the original value in the chain of functions so you can do multiple things at once, like saving a ggplot in multiple formats pic.twitter.com/yUF1WKEtjP

— Andrew Heiss, PhD (@andrewheiss) June 20, 2019
